title: Australia (Is) Open, US Super Spreader Petri Bowl 2.3.21
itunes:title: Australia (Is) Open, US Super Spreader Petri Bowl 2.3.21
description:
In episode 804, Jack and guest host Jamie Loftus are joined by writer and director Cody Ziglar to discuss the impeachment, the coronavirus being depoliticized, the Australian Open versus the Super Bowl, NYC restaurants re-opening, police body cams, the guys behind the GameStop run, the passing of Captain Sir Tom Moore, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. House charges Trump is 'singularly responsible' for inciting insurrection as ex-president's team claims he's protected by 1st Amendment
  2. Ocasio-Cortez reveals she’s a sexual assault survivor, recounts ‘trauma’ of Capitol riot: ‘I thought everything was over’
  3. Pandemic’s deadliest month in US ends with signs of progress
  4. Australian Open to accommodate biggest sporting crowds since COVID-19 outbreak
  5. Andrew Cuomo Accepts Emmy Award as Coronavirus Cases Continue to Rise
  6. New York Gov. Andrew Cuomo book on Covid-19 response out in October
  7. Indoor Dining Will Reopen in New York City at 25% Capacity
  8. New science reevaluates risks of indoor dining
  9. Limited indoor dining will return to NYC by Valentine’s Day, Cuomo says
  10. Restaurant Workers Should Be Allowed to Get the Vaccine Immediately
  11. Cuomo Defends His Decision to Bring Back Indoor Dining in NYC This Month
  12. Cuomo shoots down expanding COVID vaccine eligibility to restaurant workers
  13. CDC recommends restaurant workers for early round of COVID-19 vaccine
  14. Coronavirus exacerbates racial wage gap for tipped workers, report finds
  15. Indoor Dining Is Fastest-Growing Source of COVID-19 Spread in New York, State Says
  16. Minneapolis police officers must keep body cameras turned on during entire response to a call, new policy says
  17. Reddit Trades Crumble as GameStop, AMC and Silver Plunge
  18. Captain Sir Tom Moore: 'National inspiration' dies with Covid-19
  19. WATCH: QT - Hey QT

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
